devdoc.details: A simple contract that allows users to swap ETH for USDC at a fixed rate

calculateUSDCAmount(uint256).details: Calculate how much USDC you would get for a given amount of ETH

fundWithUSDC(uint256).details: Fund the contract with USDC (owner only)

params.amount: The amount of USDC to add to the contract

getContractETHBalance().details: Get the contract's current ETH balance

returns._0: The ETH balance of this contract

getContractUSDCBalance().details: Get the contract's current USDC balance

returns._0: The USDC balance of this contract
The amount of USDC (with 6 decimals) per 1 ETH

swapETHForUSDC().details: Swap ETH for USDC at the current exchange rate

params._newRate: The new exchange rate (USDC per ETH with 6 decimals)

withdrawETH(uint256).details: Withdraw ETH from the contract (owner only)

params.amount: The amount of ETH to withdraw (in wei)

withdrawUSDC(uint256).details: Withdraw USDC from the contract (owner only)

params.amount: The amount of USDC to withdraw

devdoc.title: ETH to USDC Swap Contract

swapETHForUSDC().notice: Sends ETH and receives USDC in return

userdoc.notice: This is for testnet demonstration purposes
